item.description:
There is a nationwide push by our government and national media to ban our legally owned firearms. Sen. Diane Feinstein (Ca) has put a plan forward that includes:

  • Banning over 1000 legally owned firearms
  • Banning high capacity magazines
  • Registration of firearms
  • $200.00 tax on each firearm on the ban list.
  • Requirement for owners of firearms to be determined qualified to own firearms
  • Illegal to pass on or transfer any firearms on the ban list, they must be turned in when owner passes on.

We will be discussing our options and a plan that I believe will help here in NH as well as in other states. The President has put Vice President Joe Biden in charge of building consensus for this plan and he is now touring the country working on this plan.  If you value your freedom then this conversation is a must for us to have and to organize to defeat any such actions.
item.name: Gun Control in New Hampshire, what do we do?
